COMPANY NAME: Scholastica Ltd. (A Concern of ASCENT Group)
GENDER: Only males are allowed to apply
JOB RESPONSIBILITIES: Office network setup as per the requirements of the Company.Develop and maintain positive working relationships with others. Deploy new requirements and integrate with current system. Inspect, test, and diagnose computer equipment and systems.  Perform system backups. Provide end-user support. Should have Strong knowledge of network, antivirus, and software troubleshooting.Modify workstations, including set up of cables, desktop computers, laptops, docking stations, and printers. Become a problem-solving and escalation point for group Managers in regards to technology and business issues.Design and implement LAN/WAN/Internet/Intranet connectivity for remote locations and design systems for those locations to maintain the entire internet/intranet from a central point Integrate domains for new computer users and install the PC at the user's desk.Perform routine check-up-s for different IT issues.Receive complaints from PC users in the company and act as advised by the Department Head and/or Help Desk In-charge Perform day to day troubleshooting against the complaints received in consultation with Department Head and/or Help Desk In-charge Identify recurring requirements for the PC users and provide necessary items in due time Configure/install and troubleshooting Router, Switch, AP, Printer and Scanner.PC Configure, Data Backup, Data Restore, Data Recovery from any devices.Attendance reader Setup and troubleshooting. CCTV implementation (NVR & DVR) and troubleshooting.Create local share drive or folder and set permission level of the user.Should be work under pressure and experience of manage critical users.Perform other reasonable job duties as requested by Supervisors. Assist with the introduction of new technology into operations.Maintain inventory of all technology devices.  Manage all hardware and environment installations including cabling, power and environment. Refer major problems or defective products to vendors/technicians.Work with vendors to resolve hardware issue and maintain optimum service level.
EDUCATIONAL REQUIREMENTS: M.Sc / B.Sc Hons in Computer Science/ Computer Engineering
ADDITIONAL REQUIREMENTS:
Age 25 to 35 years 
Only males are allowed to apply
Must be hardworking and energeticGood customer orientation and able to work under pressure
